alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit; Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 15 at 3:38PM HST until January 17 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY FOR HIGHEST SUMMITS OF THE BIG ISLAND AND HALEAKALA ON MAUI... .Southwest winds will increase across the high summits of the Big Island and Haleakala on Maui tonight and will become very strong Tuesday and Tuesday night. The strong winds will gradually decline on Wednesday but may remain elevated on the Big Island summits into Thursday. ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...On the Big Island summits, southwest winds of 50 to 70 mph will increase to 60 to 80 mph Tuesday. On the high summit of Haleakala on Maui, southwest winds will build to 45 to 55 mph tonight and increase to 50 to 60 mph Tuesday. * WHERE...The high summits of the Big Island and Haleakala on Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
